title: How do i level up my profile for the boards section
body: i was wondering how you can level up your profile for the boards section

replies.body: Sometimes an account needs to sync to the boards, especially if it's posting for the first time.  It looks like your post here has updated your profile!  Let us know if you still have any issues posting.

By posting or upvoting / downvoting a post. (Credits to Porocles for enlightening me upvoting / downvoting).

Looks like your profile has been updated!! Welcome to the League community and have a splash posting!!
